title: [Summit Academy, West Ellipse]
description: A dusting of snow makes the stone path shimmer in the moonlight as it curves back toward the eastern commons.  Nestled in the tall fir trees is a pale stone edifice, its many windows shuttered against the night wind.

A dusting of snow makes the stone path glitter in the sunlight as it curves back toward the eastern commons.  Nestled in the tall fir trees is a pale stone edifice, its many windows unshuttered to let in the light of day.
